column4: when i boot up my ubuntu box i get 2 error messages both involve module loading.  it tries to load shpchp and pciehp does anyone else have this problem?
Yes; they're the hotpluggable-pci drivers; unfortunately it's hard to know if it's safe or not to load them
i would think g since i want to be able to get access anywhere its available
the WG511 is a good choice then
I have two and they're excellent
what brands of cards have that chipset?
Not sure other than the Netgear WG511
can you snort with these cards?
I once got kismet going with one
but I'm far too 'white-hat' to know about that sort of thing
does it take any effort to get the wg511 working in linux or is it recognized right away?
the prism54 driver is present; you have to download firmware I think
The firmware for the prism54 cards. Check out www.prism54.org it's all on there
